General.Name: Gigas Hosting S.A
General.Description: Gigas Hosting, S.A. provides communications and cloud services for businesses. It offers Cloud Datacenter, a solution that allows users to create, modify, re-distribute, and administer its virtual data center through web control panel in real time. The company also provides Gigas Virtual Desktop, a plug-and-play solution that enables company to publish its applications on the web; SAP cloud solutions; Cloud Virtual Private Server; and colocation services, as well as load balancer, g-backup, Gigas recovery, firewall, and VPN solutions. Gigas Hosting, S.A. was founded in 2011 and is based in Alcobendas, Spain.

1.Name: Mr. Diego Cabezudo  Fernández De La Vega
1.Title: Founder & CEO
